Player History
Injured on 5/25/2013 with a Broken Finger, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/9/2014, off Justin Verlander (CHC)...
Traded from San Francisco to Chicago (N) on 3/1/2015 (Going to SF: 2B Ryan Raburn. Going to CHC: P Bussho Nobuharu, C Dan Burkhart)...
Injured on 5/10/2015 with a Broken Finger, out for 5 weeks...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 2016...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 3/1/2017.
Injured on 4/22/2017 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Was claimed off waivers by Atlanta on 3/12/2018.
Hit first career homerun on 7/26/2018, off Noah Syndergaard (NYM)...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 7/26/2018...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against San Diego on 8/23/2018...
Injured on 6/10/2019 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $552,857 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $552,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/2/2022 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $552,857 through salary arbitration...

10/29/2025: Signed a contract extension with New York (A), $2,090,000 per year, for 2 years.
